title: Children of the street
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Venezuela - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Developing countries
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Homeless children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Homeless children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Homeless children
description: Looks at lives of two newspaper boys in Caracas, Venezuela, who work up to nine hours a day to make a living on the streets of a tough city, and to earn money for an education. Useful as a comparison with a lifestyle very different to that experienced by most Australian children.
